| source json data='[
	  {ITEM: "Pineapple", CLASS: "A", VALUE:"1"}
	, {ITEM: "Pineapple", CLASS: "A", VALUE:"22"}
	, {ITEM: "Pineapple", CLASS: "A", VALUE:"333"}
	, {ITEM: "Pineapple", CLASS: "B", VALUE:"4"}
	, {ITEM: "Strawrrrberry", CLASS: "C", VALUE:"333"}
	, {ITEM: "Strawrrrberry", CLASS: "D", VALUE:"100"}
	, {ITEM: "Strawrrrberry", CLASS: "D", VALUE:"100"}
	, {ITEM: "Strawrrrberry", CLASS: "D", VALUE:"100"}
]'
| stats by=[ITEM, CLASS] 
	count() 
	min(VALUE) 
	AVG=avg(VALUE) 
	MAX=max(VALUE)
	SUM=sum(VALUE)
	MEDIAN=median(VALUE)
	"90th"=perc(VALUE,90)
| sort ITEM, CLASS
